text: Story highlights Shia LaBeouf charged with obstruction, disorderly conduct and public drunkenness He was released after posting a $ 7, 000 bond, sheriff's office says CNN ( CNN ) Actor Shia LaBeouf was arrested Saturday in Savannah, Georgia, and charged with obstruction, disorderly conduct and public drunkenness, police said. LaBeouf, 31, was taken into custody around 4 a. m., and was released later Saturday from Chatham County Detention Center after posting a $ 7, 000 bond, the Chatham County Sheriff's Office said. The actor approached a bystander and a police officer asking for a cigarette, according to a statement from the Savannah - Chatham Metropolitan Police Department.
